title: A shen lovers nightmare
body:
Hello, i'm having a little problem, i would like to buy frozen Shen on its own, not with all the other skins in the frigid frontliners bundle like all the other skins in the other bundles but frozen Shen is (legacy) so i'm guessing even when hes in a bundle you cant buy him separately. but from true patients iv'e waited a very long time to get a good Shen skin and was wondering if it could be sold to me or put on the regular store i don't have a lot of money i have 1309 RP and am willing to spend it all for the skin. i just really love Shen hes been my favorite for a long time. thank you for considerting

P.S. please respond before the bundle goes away :')

replies.body: Sometimes special or legacy skins can appear in different ways, and in the case for Frozen Shen it's specifically the Frigid Frontliners bundle.  He's not currently available for sale separately, and is meant to complete that specific ensemble.  Unfortunately, I have no information on sales for legacy skins, but I recommend bookmarking our [Sales](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales) for updates.  Best of luck!
another rioter told me this a in summer and ive waited until now and i still cant get it. but thank you for responding
You just have to wait, theres nothing else you can really do... But legacy skins often get avaible around christmas!
thanks for the tip ive waited this long i can wait a little longer :D
Just in case you didn't noticed: Shens legacy skins are available right now! ;)
